item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes :rocket: Latest release Star

item.title: CV
item.description: My CV is available in HTML or PDF form.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: During the 2018-2019 academic year, I was teaching the following practical courses at Polytech: GIS3LT: Language and Translators (Spring, in French) GIS3 Syst: Systems (Spring, in French) GIS3SA: Advanced Systems (Fall, in French) Previously, at Universit√© Toulouse III, I taught 214 hours of practical courses during the 2014-2017 years, at all levels from freshman to last year, including the topics of: algorithmics, logic, programming in C, Java, Python, OCaml, Ada, ARM assembly, compiling techniques and theories.

item.title: Fun
item.description: I am an active member of the development team of Teeworlds, an online retro multi-player platform 2D shooter, and my childhood’s game. It is free, open-source, distributed on Steam, Flathub, and as a package on most Linux repositories; it is available on all major platforms. Its free license allows and encourages a large variety of content and forks.

item.title: Docs
item.description: I leave on this website documentation for my projects. You can also read the abstract of my PhD thesis, although the full-text is unfortunately in French.
